title: Visualize Data More Clearly with Microsoft Visio’s Pro-Level Features for Only $10
description: It’s built for technical professionals, team leads, and IT admins who want to create detailed diagrams that simplify complex information.
content:
Microsoft Visio has long been the go-to for creating detailed diagrams that simplify complex information. Whether you’re mapping out a network, visualizing an org chart, or building process workflows, Visio offers the templates and tools to help you do it faster and more clearly.

Through September 14, new users can grab a license to Microsoft Visio 2021 Professional for just $9.97 (reg. $249.99). This desktop version includes all the core features of Visio Standard, along with additional templates, shapes, and collaboration tools that support industry standards like BPMN 2.0, IEEE, and UML 2.5.

Work with over 250,000 shapes, link diagrams to live data from Excel or Microsoft Entra ID, and generate org charts automatically. On touch-enabled devices, you can annotate using a pen or your finger. It’s built for technical professionals, team leads, and IT admins who want to create professional-grade diagrams without relying on subscription-based tools.

Note that this offer is for new users only and supports one-time activation. A Microsoft 365 commercial or standalone subscription is required for certain advanced features.

Get a license to Microsoft Visio 2021 Professional for only $9.97 (reg. $249.99) with instant redemption when you purchase by September 14.

Prices subject to change. PCMag editors select and review products independently. If you buy through affiliate links, we may earn commissions, which help support our testing.
summary: Through September 14, new users can purchase a license to Microsoft Visio 2021 Professional for $9.97, which includes all the core features of Visio Standard and other tools such as templates, shapes, and collaboration tools. The service is designed for technical professionals who want to create professional-grade diagrams without relying on subscription-based tools. However, a Microsoft 365 commercial or standalone subscription is required for certain advanced features.
shortSummary: Microsoft Visio 2021 Professional can be purchased for just $9.97, including advanced graphics, a support system, and a free coffee for your breakfast.

The desktop version includes full Pro features, templates, shapes, collaboration tools, live data linking, and industry‑standard support. It targets technical professionals, team leads, and IT admins who need professional‑grade diagrams without a subscription. The deal is one‑time activation; advanced features still require a Microsoft 365 subscription.
